title: A Woman of our time
brief_description: A portrait of Myra Roper, high profile teacher, journalist and ABC broadcaster, who in 1958 joined the first women’s delegation to China, later becoming first president of the Committee for Australia-China relations.
description: A portrait of Myra Roper, high profile teacher, journalist and ABC broadcaster, who in 1958 joined the first women’s delegation to China, later becoming first president of the Committee for Australia-China relations.
